name: Spicy Feta Cheese Dip
author: Evie
summary: This is best feta dip ever. It is so tangy and salty and completely addictive. People often comment that they would like to lick the bowl. Great on pitas, used as a dip, or alongside souvlaki.
ingredients: ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
1 pound feta cheese, cut into small cubes
directions: Combine olive oil, yogurt, lemon juice, paprika, garlic, black pepper, cayenne pepper, and sugar in a food processor; pulse mixture until smooth
Add a couple feta cubes at a time, processing between batches until mixture until thick and smooth
Transfer dip to a bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate at least 1 hour
